title: Deutsche Bank included in Dow Jones Sustainability Index World and Dow Jones Sustainability Index Europe
body:
Deutsche Bank returns to S&P’s Dow Jones Sustainability Index (DJSI) World and the DJSI Europe. The DJSI World comprises the top 10 percent ESG performers of the 2,500 largest companies. The threshold for an inclusion in the index was set at 65. The DJSI Europe captures the top 20 percent of ESG performers of the 600 largest European companies, requiring a minimum score of 64.
With a score of 66 out of 100 in the corresponding annual Corporate Sustainability Assessment (CSA), Deutsche Bank has now been re-included in both indices at the end of December 2024. The bank was last listed in the DJSI Europe in 2022 and in the DJSI World in 2018.
See online an index components list, detailing the companies included in the DJSI Index family.
